ygData.subject: Re: The spell Pillage.....
ygData.msgSnippet: It s full name is Pillage Enchantment and I believe that it randomly removes a good buff from the target. However, I have yet to hear of anyone that has
ygData.messageBody:
It's full name is "Pillage Enchantment" and I believe that it randomly
removes a good buff from the target. However, I have yet to hear of anyone
that has found it or found the pages to research it, so I'm not convinced
its even in the game right now.

Djar Lightbringer, Chancellor of HOA (Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
http://www.hoa-rpg.com/
